text: Kaise ho sakta hai ke Allah un logon o hidayat bakshe jinhon ne niyamat e iman paa lene ke baad phir kufr ikhtiyar kiya halaanke woh khud is baat par gawahi de chuke hain ke yeh Rasool haqq par hai aur inke paas roshan nishaniyan bhi aa chuki hain, Allah zalimon ko to hidayat nahin diya karta
